Steps to reproduce:

watched videos in max screen online 


Actual results:

when i closed the video and went to close browser the  buttons for closing minimizing and making browser smaller were gone from the top right corner 
i can right click and the drop down panel would show but that was about it 


Expected results:

top right corner should of had  - , 2 boxes, and a red X to close it
